amount.name: amount
amount.description: Absolute numeric amount which should be interpreted as is.

amountWithPrecision.name: amount with precision
amountWithPrecision.description: Numeric amount which should be converted to the human friendly form by taking the number of decimals into account.

ticker.name: ticker
ticker.description: Short representation for the digital asset name. For example Uniswap coin's ticker is `UNI`.

boolean.name: boolean
boolean.description: True/False value usually representing the status of the executed operation.
